data.title: Letter To Donald Trump From Retired Generals and Admirals
data.meta_description: Letter to Donald Trump from retired generals and admirals - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. 176 retired US military flag and general officers sign a letter to President-elect Trump expressing concern over statements made during his campaign supporting torture. They argue that torture is unlawful, counterproductive, and against American values. Lawful interrogation techniques are more effective for obtaining intelligence. They look forward to working with Trump to uphold national security policies that respect human rights and the rule of law.
data.text: Letter To Donald Trump From Retired Generals and Admirals
